name: Doctor Queralt
desc: Un dels millors cirurgians de la ciutat viu just al costat de la Sagrada Família. Diu que l’ha vista des que era petitó, i li porta records de quan anava al parc amb els seus avis. De vegades, quan arriba cansat a casa, seu al sofà i mira la Sagrada Família, mai s’en cansarà.
descENG: One of the finest surgeons in the city lives right next to the Sagrada Família. He says he's watched it since he was a little boy, and it brings back memories of going to the park with his grandparents. Sometimes when he comes home exhausted, he sinks into his sofa and gazes at the basilica - a sight he'll never grow tired of.
